page.title: 15RELIGION-SERVICES
page.content: The Rector of Barking is also Rector of Battisford and Ringshall, and is assisted by two lay readers. The services for the three churches are on a monthly rota with one service in each church each week except for the fifth Sunday when there is a combined service. Battisford has a similar attendance to Barking but Ringshall is smaller. The joint Sunday school is held each Saturday from 9.30a.m. to 11.00 a.m. for 3 - 10 year olds, and is called "Saturday Special". The Free Church at Barking is also well attended, both at their Sunday services and their Sunday School and Youth Club. They also provide entertainment during the school holidays.
